泉

Значения

Источник, родник, ключ

Мнемоника

Источник, дающий белую 白, т.е. чистую воду 水.

purpleculture_examples:
源泉 [ yuán quán ]: fountainhead; well-spring; water source; fig. origin
温泉 [ wēn quán ]: Arishang Nahiyisi or Wenquan county in Börtala Mongol autonomous prefecture 博尔塔拉蒙古自治州 , Xinjiang
温泉 [ wēn quán ]: hot spring; spa; onsen
泉水 [ quán shuǐ ]: spring water; Classifiers: 股
矿泉水 [ kuàng quán shuǐ ]: mineral spring water; Classifiers: 瓶
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 白 [ bái ] white; clear, pure, unblemished; bright
    • 水 [ shuǐ ] water, liquid, lotion, juice
heisig_chinese_memo: White is a symbol of purety, so white water is pure water, the precise definition of spring water.
heisig_story: Call to mind the image of a fresh, bubbling spring of water, and you will probably notice how the top of the spring you are thinking of, the part where the "bubbling" goes on, is all white. Happily, the white is just where it should be, at the top, and the water is at the bottom.
koohiiStory1: White is a symbol of purety, so white water is pure water, the precise definition of spring water.
koohiiStory2: Perhaps the most common appearance of this kanji is in the word 温泉 (おんせん, onsen), a Japanese hot spring. The kanji is an excellent image of someone enjoying a Japanese hot spring: a little white towel on top, water below. (This helps keep all associations: spring, little and onsen).
jp_example_words:
泉(いずみ): spring, fountain
温泉(おんせん): spa, hot spring
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: White water shoots out from a spring in the ground. Due to the force the water shoots from the spring, the water looks white with all the air bubbles.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine these geysers and the white water shooting from the springs under the ground. Now imagine yourself standing over one when the water shoots out. You’d get super wet and probably knocked over due to the force of the spring water. Imagine this happening to yourself.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The only creature powerful enough to withstand the force of these white water springs is the mythical centaur (せん). His horse body allows him to be stable and withstand the white water shooting up from the spring. Centaurs are pretty impressive creatures.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine this centaur standing over the white water. It’s just like a shower for him! Hear him laughing with mirth as the whoosh of the spring water washes him down.
Ru_trainchinese: quán: (сущ) (водный) источник, родник; выход источника на поверхность
Kanshudo_mnemonic: white (白) water (水) flows from a spring
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: White is a symbol of purety, so white water is pure water, the precise definition of spring water.
origin_of_ch_char_book: (泉, quan=ch’üan, spring) suggests water from a spring and flowing downwards through the waterway. It depicts springwater gushing from the depths. The ancient Chinese thought of life as being like a flowing stream, coming from somewhere and going somewhere unknown. Therefore, they called the place where dead people go a “yellow spring (黃泉)”, or “netherworld”. They believed that when one died, one would go to underworld beneath the spring.
humanum_full_description_en:
Later, the word " yuan " was created on top of " spring " by adding the symbol " chang " (the provincial form of " stone ") to indicate the source of water, see " yuan ". "Shuowen": "Spring is the water source. Like water flows out into a river. All springs come from the spring."

Oracle is used as the original meaning of spring water. Bronze inscriptions are used as names of people and places.
humanum_short_description_en: Jiajin inscriptions from " ◎ " from " water ", like the shape of spring water flowing out of stone pots (crevices) or caves, oracle bone inscriptions from one side of the T shape, like a rock gap. The original meaning is spring water, spring source.
humanum_full_description:
後來於「泉」上疊增義符「厂」(「石」之省形)造「原」字，表示水源，參見「原」。《說文》：「泉，水原也。象水流出成川形。凡泉之屬皆从泉。」

　　甲骨文用作本義，表示泉水。金文用作人名和地名。
humanum_short_description: 甲金文從「◎」從「水」，象泉水自石罅(縫隙)或岩穴中流出之形，甲骨文或加從T形的一橫一豎，象石隙之形。本義是泉水、泉源。

後來於「 泉 」上疊增義符「 厂 」(「 石 」之省形)造「 原 」字，表示水源，參見「 原 」。《說文》：「泉，水原也。象水流出成川形。凡泉之屬皆从泉。」 甲骨文用作本義，表示泉水。金文用作人名和地名。
Later, the word " yuan" was created on top of " spring" by adding the symbol " chang" (the provincial form of " stone") to indicate the source of water, see " yuan". "Shuowen": "Spring is the water source. Like water flows out into a river. All springs come from the spring." Oracle is used as the original meaning of spring water. Bronze inscriptions are used as names of people and places.

泉字的基本解释

泉
quán
从地下流出的水源：泉源。泉瀑。甘泉。温泉。喷泉。黄泉（旧时称人死后所在的地方。亦作“九泉”）。
古代钱币的名称。
姓。

泉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［quán］
［《廣韻》疾緣切，平仙，從。］
亦作“湶1”。亦作“灥2”。
(1)泉水。
(2)泛指江河湖海之水。
(3)地下水。
(4)泉下。指人死后埋葬的地方。
(5)古代钱币的名称。
(6)姓。北周有泉企。见《周书》本传。

泉字的英文翻译

◎ 泉
font, fount, spring

泉字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　泉； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页615第12
〔古文〕洤【唐韻】疾緣切【集韻】【韻會】從緣切【正韻】才緣切，?音全。【說文】水原也。象水流成川形。【易·蒙象】山下出泉。　又【爾雅·釋水】濫泉正出。正出，涌出也。沃泉縣出。縣出，下出也。氿泉穴出。穴出，仄出也。　又同出異歸曰肥泉。【詩·衞風】我思肥泉，兹之永歎。　又醴泉。【禮·禮運】天降膏露，地出醴泉。　又泉有光華曰榮泉。【前漢·郊祀歌】食甘露，飮榮泉。　又瀑布曰立泉。【班固·終南山賦】立泉落落。　又州名。【廣輿記】周時爲七閩地，隋曰溫陵，唐曰泉州。　又天泉，星名。【甘氏星經】天泉十星，在鼈東。一曰大海，主灌漑溝渠之事。　又龍泉，劒名。卽龍淵也。【杜甫詩】三尺獻龍泉。　又姓。南史有泉企。　又貨泉，卽錢也。【周禮·天官】外府掌布之出入。【註】布，泉也。其藏曰泉，其行曰布，取名于水泉，其流行無不徧也。又【地官·泉府註】泉，或作錢。　又【集韻】疾眷切，全去聲。義同。　又【韻補】叶才勻切，音秦。【李尤·東觀銘】房闥內布，疏綺外陳。是謂東觀，書籍林泉。【集

泉字的源字形

泉字的起名意思

：本义泉水，从地下流出的水源；地下水的天然露头。水源象征万物之源。

spring
Basic explanation of words
spring
quán
The source of water flowing from the ground: spring source. Spring waterfall. Ganquan. spa. fountain. Huangquan (formerly known as the place where a person lives after death. Also known as "Nine Springs").
The names of ancient coins.
name.
spring
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［quán］
["Guangyun" Jiyuanqi, Pingxian, from. ]
Also known as "湶1". Also known as "Hu 2".
(1) Spring water.
(2) Refers to the water of rivers, lakes and seas.
(3) Groundwater.
(4) Spring under. Refers to the place where a person is buried after death.
(5) The names of ancient coins.
(6) Last name. There are spring enterprises in the Northern Zhou Dynasty. See the biography of "Book of Zhou".

[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　quan; Kangxi strokes: 9; Page number: page 615 12
[Ancient text] Bing [Tang Yun] Chi Yuan cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Cut from the Yuan [Zheng Yun] to make the cut, the sound is all. [Said the text] Suwon also. Like water flows into a river shape. 【Yi·Mengxiang】Spring comes out of the mountain.　[Erya·Shishui] Overflowing springs are emerging. It's coming out, and it's gushing out. From Woquan County. Out of the county, out of the next. Jiuquan points out. The hole comes out, and the point comes out.　The same goes back again called Feiquan. 【Poetry·Weifeng】I think about Feiquan, and I will sigh forever.　You Liquan. 【Rite·Rite Luck】The sky descends from the sky, and the earth comes out of Liquan.　Youquan has glory and is called Rongquan. [Pre-Han · Jiao Si Song] Eat nectar, Sang Rongquan.　The waterfall is called Liquan. 【Ban Gu·Zhongnan Mountain Fu】Liquan falls.　Also the name of the state. [Guang Yu Ji] The Zhou Dynasty is the Seven Min Land, the Sui Dynasty is called Wen Ling, and the Tang Dynasty is called Quanzhou.　 Tianquan again, star name. [Gan's Star Sutra] Ten stars in Tianquan, in the east of the turtle. One is the sea, the main thing is to irrigate the ditches.　Longquan again, 劒名. Longyuan also. [Poems of Du Fu] Three feet offering Longquan.　Another last name. There are spring enterprises in southern history.　You Huoquan, I have money. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan】The entry and exit of the Foreign Mansion. [Note] Cloth, spring also. Its storage is called spring, and its walking is called cloth. It is named after water spring, and its popularity is everywhere. Also 【Langguan·Quanfu Note】Spring, or money.　 [Ji Yun] I'm sick and cut, all go to the sound. spring
Source glyph
spring
Name meaning
: The original meaning of spring water, the source of water flowing from the ground; the natural outcrop of groundwater. The source of water symbolizes the source of all things.

泉
本义是“水源”,也指“地下
水”。古文字形像山石间的一个泉
眼,泉水由里往外流出。隶书之后
从字形就难以看出意思来了。

весна
Первоначальное значение - «источник воды», также относится к «грунтовым водам».
Древние персонажи напоминают родник между скалами, а родниковая вода течет изнутри наружу.
После официального сценария трудно разглядеть значение шрифта.
E Ruxuequaner
quán
1) источник, родник, ключ; фонтан
渴马赴泉 томимый жаждой конь к источнику стремится
清泉 чистый родник
喷油泉 нефтяной фонтан
2) (сокр. вм. 九泉) девять источников, загробный мир
泉乡 селения загробного мира, тот свет
3) Цюань (имя)
Radicals: 白, 水  (white, water)
Meaning Mnemonic
White water shoots out from a spring in the ground. Due to the force the water shoots from the spring, the water looks white with all the air bubbles.
Imagine these geysers and the white water shooting from the springs under the ground. Now imagine yourself standing over one when the water shoots out. You’d get super wet and probably knocked over due to the force of the spring water. Imagine this happening to yourself.
Reading Mnemonic
The only creature powerful enough to withstand the force of these white water springs is the mythical centaur (せん). His horse body allows him to be stable and withstand the white water shooting up from the spring. Centaurs are pretty impressive creatures.
Imagine this centaur standing over the white water. It’s just like a shower for him! Hear him laughing with mirth as the whoosh of the spring water washes him down.
